desc: Karma Koncept is a vegan brand founded by Aline Roser, a French designer based in India. Every piece of our Mindful jewellery or Organic clothes has the sacred deep meaning and is filled with positive energy, charged with love and good mood, designed to promote let go, calmness, meditation, and a sense of unity!

layout.text: Totem animals are very prominent in Native American traditions, and each holds significant spiritual meaning act as our spiritual guides throughout our life and help to unveil the meaning of our true self.
